title: Cylinder Style Lamp Black
body: Sometime in 1944, Isamu Noguchi created a present for her sister and now more than 70 years later, it is considered as one of the design icons of the last century and became a trendsetting and often-copied success. Perfect ambient and desk lamp for living room end/side table, bedroom night stand, Baby room, Study, Office. Coffee Table, Cafe. Clean, linear and minimalist design, ideal as a Birthday Present.
